description: ff. 124. 193 x 139; 141 x 90 mm. 17 lin. Maghribi. 17th/18th cen. Anonymous acephalous interpretation of anthropomorphic traditions, different from the works of Ibn Qutaybah and Ibn Fūrak; Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 607 (14a) mentions Bayān mushkil al-aḥādīth al-nabawīyah of ʻAbd al-Jalīl ibn Mūsá al-Anṣārī with which the present ms. might perhaps be identical. The first complete chapter begins on fol. 3a: ... حدىث آخر . روى عن النبى ... انه قال دخلت على ربى فى جنة عدن شابا جعدا فى ثوبىن اخضرىن هذا حدىث مشکل جدا ... تفسىر ... ىحتمل هذا الحدىث وجهىن احدهما ان ىکون من اوصاف النبى Incip. (as extant): ... احمد بن حنبل أبا ثور صاحب الشافعى لما تکلّم
title: Tafsīr mushķil al-aḥādīth.
subject: Hadith—Criticism, interpretation, etc—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
